original_title: แรงเป็นไฟละลายแค่เธอ
overview: The story of the childhood of Ray is a memory that cannot be forgotten. Tak  a little hero that used to save her life. Ray always dreamed of that child. Until the past time Both have met again. And Tak still always help Ray But the serious story happened Tak to have a story with the thugs and Ray was pulled into it. Violence began to increase. Like a fire that is gone Difficult to put up easily Until the life of someone goes out with this resentment.
title: Fire & Ice
